title: We Have a Creativity Challenge!
description: We decided that we are going to all attempt to write a children's book and see who's is the best.  We have award-winning children's book author, Angela Halgrimson, join us to tell us what we need to include in our book.  We'll write these and come back tomorrow with Angela to judge them!
